visualization_prompt: Generate a spline chart showing monthly sales performance from 2022-2023 using dual-axis synchronization for revenue and units sold with synthetic trend data.
visualization_explanation: The dataset contains two time series with 24 monthly observations each (January 2022 to December 2023). Revenue values (μ=382K, σ=138) follow a positive trend with quarterly seasonality, while units sold (μ=1150, σ=413) maintain proportional scaling. Synthetic data was generated using linear growth (5.2% monthly revenue increase, 8.1% unit growth) with added normal distribution noise (σ=12% of trend value). The spline chart effectively reveals trend continuity while dual-axis formatting maintains dimensional integrity. Color choices (#2980B9 for currency, #27AE60 for count) follow Cairo's principles of perceptual discriminability. Tufte's data-ink ratio is optimized through minimal gridlines and direct value labeling in tooltips. Statistical anchors include R²=0.97 for revenue trendline and stable 0.68 revenue/units correlation coefficient.
